H0.text: In which north west town is there a penny-farthing museum? A 'Great Race' is held there every ten years.. Chester

H1.text: In which north west town is there a penny-farthing museum? A 'Great Race' is held there every ten years.. Lancaster

H2.text: In which north west town is there a penny-farthing museum? A 'Great Race' is held there every ten years.. Southport

H3.text: In which north west town is there a penny-farthing museum? A 'Great Race' is held there every ten years.. Knutsford

A4.text: Every ten years, Knutsford hosts an international three‑hour endurance race for Penny‑farthing bicycles.
